meanings.definition: The quality or state of being trendy.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded trendinesses, with its vibrant colors and unique accessories.
meanings.sent2: The store only sells clothes that reflect the latest trendinesses in fashion.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone tried to outdo each other in terms of trendinesses, resulting in some interesting outfit choices.
meanings.sent4: The trendinesses of the new smartphone model made it a must-have item for tech enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: She embraced trendinesses by constantly updating her wardrobe with the latest fashion pieces.

meanings.sent1: The trendinesses of the 80s are making a comeback in today's fashion scene.
meanings.sent2: Fashion designers always keep an eye on the latest trendinesses to stay relevant.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to combine multiple trendinesses in one outfit ended up looking like a fashion disaster.
meanings.sent4: The trendinesses of the past often influence the fashion choices of the present.
meanings.sent5: She followed the trendinesses closely to ensure her wardrobe was always up-to-date.
